languages.text: Со спутника Проницательная Зафира передано: корабль, находившийся в дрейфе неподалеку, спешно направился прочь. С корабля прошла зашифрованная вокс-передача на поверхность Райкада Минорис, в захваченные мятежниками районы. Вторая передача направлена на планетоид Райкади Филия. Обе передачи отмечены сигнатурой "Брат Сумерки". Сами послания расшифровать не удалось".

traits.locale_text: Со спутника Проницательная Зафира передано: корабль, находившийся в дрейфе неподалеку, спешно направился прочь. С корабля прошла зашифрованная вокс-передача на поверхность Райкада Минорис, в захваченные мятежниками районы. Вторая передача направлена на планетоид Райкади Филия. Обе передачи отмечены сигнатурой "Брат Сумерки". Сами послания расшифровать не удалось".

languages.text: "The satellite Zafireh the Keen reports that a ship drifting nearby has hurriedly sped away. The ship had sent an encrypted vox-transmission to the insurgent-controlled areas of the surface of Rykad Minoris. Another transmission was directed to planetoid Rykadi Philia. Both transmissions were signed 'Brother Twilight.' Their contents could not be decrypted."
languages.original_text: Со спутника Проницательная Зафира передано: корабль, находившийся в дрейфе неподалеку, спешно направился прочь. С корабля прошла зашифрованная вокс-передача на поверхность Райкада Минорис, в захваченные мятежниками районы. Вторая передача направлена на планетоид Райкади Филия. Обе передачи отмечены сигнатурой "Брат Сумерки". Сами послания расшифровать не удалось".

traits.locale_text: Zafireh the Keen Satellite reports that a nearby drifting ship has sped away in a hurry. The ship sent an encrypted vox-transmission to an insurgent-controlled area of the surface of Rykad Minoris. A second transmission was directed toward Rykadi Philia. Both transmissions were signed 'Brother Twilight.' The messages themselves could not be decrypted."

A second transmission was directed toward Rykadi Philia. Both transmissions were signed 'Brother Twilight.' The messages themselves could not be decrypted."

Both transmissions were signed as 'Brother Twilight'. Their contents could not be decrypted."

Both transmissions were signed as 'Brother Twilight'. Their contents could not be decrypted."

"The satellite Zafireh the Keen reports that a ship drifting nearby has hurriedly sped away. The ship had sent an encrypted vox-transmission to the insurgent-controlled areas of the surface of Rykad Minoris. Another transmission was directed to planetoid Rykadi Philia. Both transmissions were signed 'Brother Twilight.' Their contents could not be decrypted."

"The satellite Zafireh the Keen reports that a ship drifting nearby has hurriedly sped away. The ship had sent an encrypted vox-transmission to the insurgent-controlled areas of the surface of Rykad Minoris. Another transmission was directed to planetoid Rykadi Philia. Both transmissions were signed 'Brother Twilight.' Their contents could not be decrypted."

languages.text: "Der Satellit Zafireh der Eifrige berichtet, dass ein in der Nähe umhertreibendes Schiff eilig davongeflogen ist. Das Schiff hatte eine verschlüsselte Voxübertragung an die von Aufständischen kontrollierten Gebiete auf der Oberfläche von Rykad Minoris gesendet. Eine weitere Übertragung wurde an den Planetoiden Rykadi Philia gerichtet. Beide Übertragungen wurden mit dem Namen 'Bruder Zwielicht' signiert. Ihr Inhalt konnte nicht entschlüsselt werden."
languages.original_text: "The satellite Zafireh the Keen reports that a ship drifting nearby has hurriedly sped away. The ship had sent an encrypted vox-transmission to the insurgent-controlled areas of the surface of Rykad Minoris. Another transmission was directed to planetoid Rykadi Philia. Both transmissions were signed 'Brother Twilight.' Their contents could not be decrypted."

traits.locale_text: Der Satellit Zafireh der Eifrige berichtet, dass ein in der Nähe umhertreibendes Schiff eilig davongeflogen ist. Das Schiff hatte eine verschlüsselte Voxübertragung an die von Aufständischen kontrollierten Gebiete auf der Oberfläche von Rykad Minoris gesendet. Eine weitere Übertragung wurde an den Planetoiden Rykadi Philia gerichtet. Beide Übertragungen wurden mit dem Namen 'Bruder Zwielicht' signiert. Ihr Inhalt konnte nicht entschlüsselt werden."

languages.text: « Le satellite Zafireh l'Enthousiaste indique qu'un vaisseau dérivant à proximité est parti précipitamment. Le vaisseau avait envoyé une transmission-vox cryptée vers les zones contrôlées par les insurgés à la surface de Rykad Minoris. Une autre transmission était dirigée vers le planétoïde Rykadi Philia. Les deux transmissions étaient signées "Frère Crépuscule". Leur contenu n'a pas pu être décrypté. »
languages.original_text: "The satellite Zafireh the Keen reports that a ship drifting nearby has hurriedly sped away. The ship had sent an encrypted vox-transmission to the insurgent-controlled areas of the surface of Rykad Minoris. Another transmission was directed to planetoid Rykadi Philia. Both transmissions were signed 'Brother Twilight.' Their contents could not be decrypted."

traits.locale_text: « Le satellite Zafireh l'Enthousiaste indique qu'un vaisseau dérivant à proximité est parti précipitamment. Le vaisseau avait envoyé une transmission-vox cryptée vers les zones contrôlées par les insurgés à la surface de Rykad Minoris. Une autre transmission était dirigée vers le planétoïde Rykadi Philia. Les deux transmissions étaient signées "Frère Crépuscule". Leur contenu n'a pas pu être décrypté. »

languages.text: “根据卫星‘敏锐者扎菲瑞’报告，一艘在附近徘徊的船只匆匆离开。这艘飞船向小莱卡德表面的叛军控制区传输了加密的音阵信号，而另一条信息则传到了莱卡德菲利亚星。两份信息的署名都是‘暮光兄弟’，信息的内容无法解密。”
languages.original_text: "The satellite Zafireh the Keen reports that a ship drifting nearby has hurriedly sped away. The ship had sent an encrypted vox-transmission to the insurgent-controlled areas of the surface of Rykad Minoris. Another transmission was directed to planetoid Rykadi Philia. Both transmissions were signed 'Brother Twilight.' Their contents could not be decrypted."

traits.locale_text: “根据卫星‘敏锐者扎菲瑞’报告，一艘在附近徘徊的船只匆匆离开。这艘飞船向小莱卡德表面的叛军控制区传输了加密的音阵信号，而另一条信息则传到了莱卡德菲利亚星。两份信息的署名都是‘暮光兄弟’，信息的内容无法解密。”

languages.text: 「ザフィレ・ザ・キーン衛星の報告では、近くを漂っていた船が慌ててどこかへ消えたようだ。この船は、ライカド・ミノリスの地表の反乱軍支配地域に、暗号化されたヴォクス通信を送信していた。別の通信は、小惑星ライカディ・フィリアに送っていたという。どちらの通信も『ブラザー・トワイライト』と署名がされている。内容は解読できなかった」
languages.original_text: "The satellite Zafireh the Keen reports that a ship drifting nearby has hurriedly sped away. The ship had sent an encrypted vox-transmission to the insurgent-controlled areas of the surface of Rykad Minoris. Another transmission was directed to planetoid Rykadi Philia. Both transmissions were signed 'Brother Twilight.' Their contents could not be decrypted."

traits.locale_text: 「ザフィレ・ザ・キーン衛星の報告では、近くを漂っていた船が慌ててどこかへ消えたようだ。この船は、ライカド・ミノリスの地表の反乱軍支配地域に、暗号化されたヴォクス通信を送信していた。別の通信は、小惑星ライカディ・フィリアに送っていたという。どちらの通信も『ブラザー・トワイライト』と署名がされている。内容は解読できなかった」

languages.text: «El satélite Zafireh el Sagaz informa de que una nave a la deriva se ha alejado rápidamente. La nave había enviado una transmisión voco encriptada a las zonas controladas por los insurgentes en la superficie de Rykad Minoris. Otra transmisión se dirigió al planetoide Rykadi Philia. Ambas transmisiones estaban firmadas por el "Hermano Crepúsculo". Su contenido no pudo ser descifrado».
languages.original_text: "The satellite Zafireh the Keen reports that a ship drifting nearby has hurriedly sped away. The ship had sent an encrypted vox-transmission to the insurgent-controlled areas of the surface of Rykad Minoris. Another transmission was directed to planetoid Rykadi Philia. Both transmissions were signed 'Brother Twilight.' Their contents could not be decrypted."

traits.locale_text: El satélite Zafireh el Sagaz, informa de que una nave a la deriva se ha alejado rápidamente. La nave había enviado una transmisión voco encriptada a las zonas controladas por los insurgentes en la superficie de Rykad Minoris. Otra transmisión se dirigió al planetoide Rykadi Philia. Ambas transmisiones estaban firmadas como "Hermano Crepúsculo". Su contenido no pudo ser descifrado».

languages.text: "Aydın Zafireh uydusu, yakınlarda süzülen bir geminin hızlıca uzaklaştığını bildirmiş. Gemi kaçmadan önce asilerin kontrol ettiği Rykad Minoris bölgelerine şifreli voks yayını yapmış. Bir diğer yayın da cüce gezegen Rykadi Philia'ya yapılmış. İki yayında da 'Rahip Seher' imzası mevcut. Yayın içerikleri çözümlenememiştir."
languages.original_text: "The satellite Zafireh the Keen reports that a ship drifting nearby has hurriedly sped away. The ship had sent an encrypted vox-transmission to the insurgent-controlled areas of the surface of Rykad Minoris. Another transmission was directed to planetoid Rykadi Philia. Both transmissions were signed 'Brother Twilight.' Their contents could not be decrypted."

traits.locale_text: "Yılmaz Zafireh uydusu, yakınlarda süzülen bir geminin hızlıca uzaklaştığını ihbar etmiş. Gemi kaçmadan önce asilerin kontrol ettiği Rykad Minoris bölgelerine şifreli voks yayını yapmış. Cüce gezegen Rykadi Philia'ya başka bir yayın daha yapılmış. İki yayında da 'Rahip Seher' imzası mevcut. Yayın içerikleri çözümlenememiştir."
